tooltip.enchantery.basic: is only obtainable via Enchantment Table
tooltip.enchantery.tradeable: is only obtainable via Villager Trading
tooltip.enchantery.treasure: is only obtainable via world loot
tooltip.enchantery.untagged1: has not been added to any enchant tags
tooltip.enchantery.untagged2: and may be impossible to obtain,
enchantment.enchantery.soulbound.desc: Items with this enchant stay in your inventory after death at the cost of half their current durability.
enchantment.enchantery.diminishing_curse: Damage to durability is multiplied by curse level.
Weapon damage is increased but half the total damage is dealt back to you.
enchantment.enchantery.butterfinger_curs: Held items have a chance to drop to the ground when damage is taken.
enchantment.enchantery.leeching_curse.de: Item will repair themselves at the cost of your own life.
enchantment.enchantery.devouring_curse.d: Blocks mined are occasionally consumed by the tool to repair itself.
enchantment.enchantery.diffusion_curse.d: Potion effects applied to you will be copied to those hit by your attacks
enchantment.enchantery.kickback_curse.de: Shooting arrows will propel you backward.
